V

vectorAddition(double[], double[], long, String) - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.components.AsynchronousVectorCalculator
add each of the first operands with each of the second and return an array of the results by calling a port offering the interface ResultReceptionCI which URI is given as the last parameter; the serial number allows the caller to identify its call when receiving the result.
vectorAddition(double[], double[], long, String) - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.connections.AsynchronousVectorCalculatorServicesConnector
 
vectorAddition(double[], double[], long, String) - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.connections.AsynchronousVectorCalculatorServicesInboundPort
 
vectorAddition(double[], double[], long, String) - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.connections.AsynchronousVectorCalculatorServicesOutboundPort
 
vectorAddition(double[], double[], long, String) - Method in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.interfaces.AsynchronousVectorCalculatorServicesCI
add the first operand with the second as vectors and return a vector result by calling a port offering the interface ResultReceptionCI which URI is given as the last parameter; the serial number allows the caller to identify its call when receiving the result.
VectorClient - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.components
The class VectorialClient implements a component that calls the asynchronous vector calculator component to show how it works.
VectorClient() - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.components.VectorClient
 
VectorClient(String) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.components.VectorClient
 
vectorSubtraction(double[], double[], long, String) - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.components.AsynchronousVectorCalculator
subtract each of the first operands with each of the second and return an array of the results by calling a port offering the interface ResultReceptionCI which URI is given as the last parameter; the serial number allows the caller to identify its call when receiving the result.
vectorSubtraction(double[], double[], long, String) - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.connections.AsynchronousVectorCalculatorServicesConnector
 
vectorSubtraction(double[], double[], long, String) - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.connections.AsynchronousVectorCalculatorServicesInboundPort
 
vectorSubtraction(double[], double[], long, String) - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.connections.AsynchronousVectorCalculatorServicesOutboundPort
 
vectorSubtraction(double[], double[], long, String) - Method in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynvcacl.interfaces.AsynchronousVectorCalculatorServicesCI
subtract the second operand from the first as vectors and return a vector result by calling a port offering the interface ResultReceptionCI which URI is given as the last parameter; the serial number allows the caller to identify its call when receiving the result.
